title: Buying OJ Managers - Barnes, Mutrie, Watkins, Burnham, Loftus, McGunnicle, & Gaffney
author: shammus

posts.post_title: Buying OJ Managers - Barnes, Mutrie, Watkins, Burnham, Loftus, McGunnicle, & Gaffney
posts.post_content:
And Buckenberger and Jimmy Williams too if they're around.  I decided to give the Manager subset a try and maybe start collecting more cards of players in street clothes.  Nothing too high grade please but I'm willing to consider anything.

Thanks in advance!

Brian
